synonyms: śraddhā—faith; viśeṣataḥ—particularly; prītiḥ—love; śrī-mūrteḥ—of the Deity form of the Lord; aṅghri-sevane—in service of the lotus feet.
translation: " 'One should have full faith and Iove in worshiping the lotus feet of the Deity.

purport.content: This verse and the following two verses are found in the Bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhu (1.2.90-92).
